            <entry>http://www2.edu.fi/materiaalipankki/showfile.php?id=314&file=314_hiusten-huuhtelu.jpg</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fi">Hiusten huuhtelu</string>
            <string language="en">Rinsing one’s hair</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausspülen des one?s Haares</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rinicage des cheveux d'one?s</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Enxaguando o cabelo dos one?s</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sciacquatura dei capelli dei one?s</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ξέπλυμα της τρίχας one?s</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aclarar el pelo de los one?s</string>
          </title>
          <language>fi</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fi">Viivapiirros hiusten huuhtelusta, osa kuvasarjaa suihkussa käymisestä.</string>
            <string language="en">Line drawing of rinsing one’s hair, part of an image series of taking a shower.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeile Zeichnung des Ausspülens von von one?s 
Haar, Teil einer Bildreihe des Nehmens einer Dusche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ligne schéma de rincer des one?s cheveux, une 
partie d'une série d'image de prendre une douche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Linha desenho de enxaguar one?s cabelo, parte de 
uma série da imagem de fazer exame de um chuveiro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riga illustrazione di sciacquatura dei one?s 
capelli facente parte una serie di immagine di presa dell'acquazzone.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο γραμμών του ξεπλύματος one?s της τρίχας, 
μέρος μιας σειράς εικόνας λήψης ενός ντους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Línea gráfico de aclarar los one?s pelo, parte 
de una serie de la imagen de tomar una ducha.</string>
          </description>
        </general>
